name: generatePBKDFKey
description: CFML implementation of Password-Based Key-Derivation Function (PBKDF)

params.name: algorithm
params.description: Hashing algorithm used for generating key

params.name: passphrase
params.description: Passphrase used for the key. KEEP THIS SECRET.

params.name: salt
params.description: A string which will be added to the passphrase before encryption

params.name: iterations
params.description: The number of PBKDEF iterations to perform. A minimum recommended value is 1000

params.name: keysize
params.description: The length in bytes of the key to generate

coldfusion.notes:
These algorithms are available only in enterprise versions:

PBKDF2WithSHA1
PBKDF2WithSHA224
PBKDF2WithSHA256
PBKDF2WithSHA384
PBKDF2WithSHA512
PBKDF2WithSHA512-224
PBKDF2WithSHA512-256

lucee.notes: Lucee seems to support only "PBKDF2WithHmacSHA1" and "PBKDF2WithHmacSHA512" are allowed values for algorithm argument
